column2: Validate registering an account by providing the account details

column4: Enter new Account details into the fields (First Name, Last Name, E-Mail, Telephone, Password, Confirm Password and Privacy Policy fields)

column6: User should be logged in, taken to 'Account Success' page and proper details should be displayed on the page

column4: Click on 'Continue' button that is displayed in the 'Account Success' page
column6: User should be taken to 'Account' page and a confirm email should be sent to the registered email address
